H0.text: Meter stick, microscope, and test tubes are the equipment best used for an activity on a biochemistry unit.

H1.text: Test tube, hot plate, and safety goggles are the equipment best used for an activity on a biochemistry unit.

H2.text: Balance, telescope, and graduated cylinder are the equipment that would best be used for an activity on a biochemistry unit.

H3.text: Petri dish, dissecting equipment, and spring scale are the equipment that would best be used for an activity on a biochemistry unit.

A4.text: The classical equipment includes tools such as Bunsen burners and microscopes as well as specialty equipment such as operant conditioning chambers, Bioreactors, spectrophotometers and calorimeters.

A5.text: Test tubes are widely used by chemists to handle chemicals, especially for qualitative experiments and assays.

A6.text: Culture tubes are test tubes used in biology and related sciences for handling and culturing all kinds of live organisms, such as molds, bacteria, seedlings, plant cuttings, etc.
